https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8mwkRGiDTPBpzs7wyd204eKJXLq.jpg In April 1999 Deep Purple made their triumphant return to Australia after a prolonged absence. This DVD includes the full show from Melbourne Park as well as bonus footage, interviews, extras and more. Deep Purple: Total Abandon
